fragment: Walt admits that he cooks meth causing Skyler to leave deeply shaken.
Skyler confronts Walt about the divorce and accuses him of being a weed dealer.
Jesse is in rehab trying to overcome his drug addiction and come to terms with Jane's death.
Hank brutally attacks Jesse in retaliation for the incident at the impound lot.
Marie lashes out at Hank's boss when she hears they had taken his gun away.
Walt Jr. is thrilled that his dad is back but Skyler calls the police in an attempt to have Walt thrown out.
Saul wants Walt to start producing meth again and takes steps to encourage him in that direction.
Gus arranges a meeting with his Mexican cartel counterparts and makes it clear that he wants Walt left alone.
Mike is one of Gus' most loyal henchmen and one of Saul's associates.
Gale is one of Gus' associates who briefly worked with Walt.
Victor is one of Gus' henchmen.
The Cousins are twin brothers seeking revenge for the death of their cousin Tuco.
Steven is Hank's partner at the DEA.
Skinny Pete is one of Jesse's friends.
Ted is Skyler's former boss who she has a brief affair with.
Gale is one of Gus' associates who briefly worked with Walt.
George is the head of the Albuquerque DEA office, Hank and Steve's boss.
The Group Leader is a counselor who helps recovering drug addicts, including Jesse.
Badger is one of Jesse's friends.
Hector is Leonel and Marco's uncle and Gus' arch-nemesis.
Juan is a high-ranking cartel member.
Andrea is a recovering addict who Jesse meets at group therapy.
Carmen is the principal of JP Wynne High School where Walter Jr. attends and where Walt used to work.
Donald is Jesse's former landlord who is still grieving over the death of his daughter Jane.
Old Joe is a junkyard owner who helps Walt and Jesse destroy the RV they cooked meth in.
Diane is Jesse's mother.
Francesca is Saul's secretary.
Jane is Donald's deceased daughter and Jesse's former girlfriend.
Combo is Jesse's deceased friend.
Bogdan is Walt's former boss who owns a car wash that Walt wants to buy.
Tortuga is a cartel member who worked as an informant for the DEA until he was killed by Leonel and Marco.
